price: دا حقه ورځ ده نو چې د چا خوښه وي د خپل پالونکي لور ته د ورګرځېدو لار دې ونيسي.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-yawmu al-ḥaqu faman shāa ittakhadha ilā rabbihi maāban
